headlines.description: Jan Vertonghen and Dele Alli scored first-half goals as Tottenham opened their Premier League season with a 2-1 victory over Newcastle.

video.headline: Bournemouth 2-0 Cardiff City: Wilson makes amends following penalty miss

tracking.trackingName: Newcastle 1-2 Tottenham: Weary Spurs get 3 points **Singapore only**

headlines.shortLinkText: Vertonghen, Alli score as Spurs win at Newcastle

headlines.description: Promoted Cardiff City's first Premier League match for four years ended in a 2-0 defeat by Bournemouth.
headlines.shortLinkText: Fraser, Wilson help Bournemouth beat Cardiff

headlines.description: Goals by Jeffrey Schlupp and Wilfried Zaha helped Crystal Palace to a 2-0 win against Fulham at Craven Cottage on Saturday.

video.headline: Fulham 0-2 Crystal Palace: Palace clinical at Craven Cottage

tracking.trackingName: Fulham 0-2 Crystal Palace: Palace clinical at Craven Cottage

headlines.shortLinkText: Schlupp, Zaha strike as Palace win at Fulham

headlines.description: Chelsea manager Maurizio Sarri made a winning start to life in the Premier League as his team enjoyed a 3-0 win over Huddersfield Town.

video.headline: Huddersfield 0-3 Chelsea: Chelsea convincing in easy win

tracking.trackingName: Huddersfield 0-3 Chelsea: Chelsea convincing in easy win

headlines.shortLinkText: Chelsea's Sarri gets winning start at Huddersfield

headlines.description: Roberto Pereyra scored twice as Watford opened their Premier League campaign with a 2-0 victory over Brighton & Hove Albion at Vicarage Road.

video.headline: Watford 2-0 Brighton: Roberto Pereyra nets two

tracking.trackingName: Watford 2-0 Brighton: Roberto Pereyra nets two

headlines.shortLinkText: Pereyra shines as Watford beat Brighton

headlines.description: Richarlison scored twice in his first Premier League appearance for Everton, but a late goal from Raul Jimenez helped Wolves salvage a 2-2 draw.

video.headline: Wolverhampton Wanderers 2-2 Everton: Wolves fight back

tracking.trackingName: Wolverhampton Wanderers 2-2 Everton: Wolves fight back

headlines.shortLinkText: Wolves salvage late draw vs. 10-man Everton
